name: Bidding
description: A feature that lets users take part in auctions.

name: Discounts and Offers
description: The ability to apply discounts and offers across a set of items for a period of time.

name: Express Delivery
description: A feature that computes express delivery charges and displays time to deliver or be picked up from store.

name: Gift Cards
description: Allow customers to convert cash into credit for gifting.

name: Item Availability
description: A feature to calculate the availability of a product in a user's cart based on the amount of current reservation of the product and the stock limit of the same product.

name: Loyalty Points
description: A feature that offers discount or rewards to customers based on engagement.

name: Order Summary
description: Display an order summary prior to checkout.

name: Pricing Engine
description: Predict the expected price based on different selections and variables.

name: Reservations
description: A feature to make a reservation for a scheduled event.

name: Shopping Cart
description: Allow customers to accumalate a list of items prior to purchase.

name: Wishlist
description: Allows customers to add their favorite items for future purchase or sharing.
